mapper.select:
select a.user_sq as user_sq, a.user_id as user_id, a.user_nm as user_nm, a.addr1 as addr1, a.addr2 as addr2, a.zipcode as zipcode, a.phone as phone, date_format(a.insert_dt, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as insert_dt, date_format(a.update_dt, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as update_dt from myapp.user_info a where 1 = 1
and a.user_nm like concat('%', #{user_nm}, '%')
and a.user_id = #{user_id}
order by a.user_sq desc
